verbs.name: move
verbs.description: Allows the player to move to a different location in the game world.

verbs.name: look
verbs.description: Provides a description of the current surroundings or a specific object.

verbs.name: take
verbs.description: Picks up an item and adds it to the player's inventory.

verbs.name: drop
verbs.description: Removes an item from the player's inventory and places it in the current location.

verbs.name: use
verbs.description: Uses an item in the player's inventory, triggering its effect.

verbs.name: attack
verbs.description: Engages in combat with an enemy or object.

verbs.name: talk
verbs.description: Initiates a conversation with a non-player character (NPC).

verbs.name: cast
verbs.description: Casts a spell if the player has learned it.

verbs.name: inspect
verbs.description: Provides detailed information about an object or character.
